Title: Polite Kettle
Description 1: A kettle that informs its owner politely when its water is boiling. A fine addition to any household.
Description 2: Lex receives 2 points. Polite Kettle is added to Lex’s inventory.

Title: A Way Back
Description 1: Lex can play discovery cards from the previous terrain up to two phases after this card is played, even if he has switched to a new terrain.
Description 2: Lex can play discovery cards from the previous terrain up to two phases after this card is played, even if he has switched to a new terrain.

Title: Scribbled Map
Description 1: Lex can’t tell if the dark spot is a place or an oil stain. Only one way to find out!
Description 2: Depending on RNG/dice roll, Lex will either receive nothing and be trapped in the same terrain for 1 whole day-phase OR will find 5 gold.

Title: Unicorn Hair
Description 1: Hand increased by 2 while Lex is in possession.
Description 2: The maximum amount of cards Lex can hold increases by 2, and the item “Unicorn Hair” is added to Lex’s inventory. Lex is also given 10 points.

Title: Knight’s Regimen
Description 1: Tired of spending heaps of gold on a trainer? This Regimen will give you the toned calves you need for just fifteen minutes a day!
Description 2: Must be played in the Dawn phase. Lex can play two cards in the Afternoon phase instead of one.

Title: Tattered Tent
Description 1: Lex does not need to find a location to sleep while he is in possession of the Tattered Tent.
Description 2: Lex does not need a place to sleep while this item is in his inventory.

Title: Clear The Path
Description 1: Lex travels to any terrain type. Can be used to counter any effect that would confine him to a specific terrain type or force him to move to a terrain type.
Description 2: Lex travels to any terrain of his choosing. Can be played to counter any effect that would confine him to a specific terrain or force him to move to a specific terrain.

Title: Ludlow’s Alchemy
Description 1: Mushrooms have grown overnight. Lex receives 1 point. Provides medium shelter.
Description 2: Lex receives a point for every morning he stays at the cabin. Provides medium shelter.

Title: Love Letter
Description 1: How lucky! Lex discovers a small note tucked inside his cloak with +2 gold inside. The note is messily signed by his sister. (Love you too!)

Title: Old Log Cabin
Description 1: Dawn: Mushrooms have grown overnight. Lex receives 1 point. Provides medium shelter.
